xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
Class ProductKernelFunction

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.ProductKernelFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
KernelFunctionND
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProductKernelFunction.Biweight, ProductKernelFunction.Epanechnikow
public class ProductKernelFunction
extends Object
implements KernelFunctionND

This class provides the product of a given one-dimensional kernel function for using it as a n-dimensional real-valued kernel function as modelled in KernelFunctionND. For concrete applications the n-dimensional Epanechnikow kernel as well as the n-dimensional Biweight kernel are provided as static classes.

See Also:
KernelFunctionND, AdaBandKernelDensityEstimatorND, EpanechnikowKernel, BiweightKernel, TriweightKernel, CosineArchKernel, GaussianKernel

Nested Class Summary
static class ProductKernelFunction.Biweight
          This class provides a n-dimensional product kernel function based upon the one-dimensional biweight kernel.
static class ProductKernelFunction.Epanechnikow
          This class provides a n-dimensional product kernel function based upon the one-dimensional epanechnikow kernel.

Method Detail

eval

public double eval(double[] x)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
Evaluates the product kernel function at given real-valued n-dimensional point x and returns f(x) with f : R^n --> R.

Specified by:
eval in interface KernelFunctionND
Parameters:
x - real-valued function argument given as double []
Returns:
f(x)
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the dimension of the given argument doesn't match the dimension of the kernel function
